employerAdmin.employer_admin module¶

class employerAdmin.employer_admin.MyAdminSite(name='admin')[source]¶

Bases: AdminSite

Custom admin site for SkillBuilder employers.

The header displayed on the admin site. :noindex:

Site_title:

The title displayed on the admin site. :noindex:

Login_template:

The template used for the admin login page. :noindex:
